amendment.description: To prohibit the use of funds to implement a rule that sets maximum limits on the serving of vegetables in school meal programs or is inconsistent with the recommendations of the most recent Dietary Guidelines for Americans for vegetables.

vote.text: Amendment SA 804 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 804 proposed by Senator Collins to Amendment SA 738. (consideration: CR S6649-6650; text: CR S6649) To prohibit the use of funds to implement a rule that sets maximum limits on the serving of vegetables in school meal programs or is inconsistent with the recommendations of the most recent Dietary Guidelines for Americans for vegetables.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 804 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 804 proposed by Senator Collins to Amendment SA 738.
